Sentencas: Films of yuria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) on a polished silicon substrate of diameter up to 125 mm have been produced in a large-area pulsed laser deposition (PLD) setup under typical PLD conditions.
Titulo: Thickness determination of large-area films of yttria-stabilized zirconia produced by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The film thickness over the full film area has been determined by energy-dispersive Xray spectrometry in a scanning electron microscope (SEM) with use of a method similar to one described by Bishop and Poole.
Titulo: Thickness determination of large-area films of yttria-stabilized zirconia produced by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The attenuation of the electron-induced X-rays from the Si wafer by the film was monitored at a number of points along a diameter and the thickness was determined by Monte Carlo simulations of the attenuation for various values of film thickness with the program CASINO.
Titulo: Thickness determination of large-area films of yttria-stabilized zirconia produced by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: These results have been compared with direct measurements in the SEM of the film thickness on a cross-section on one of the wafers.
Titulo: Thickness determination of large-area films of yttria-stabilized zirconia produced by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The results of these measurements demonstrate the ability of this technique to accurately determine the thickness of a large film, i.e. up to diameters of 125 mm, in a relatively short time, without destroying the substrate, without the need of a standard sample and without the need of a flat substrate.
Titulo: Thickness determination of large-area films of yttria-stabilized zirconia produced by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: We have also demonstrated that by controlling the deposition parameters large-area YSZ films with uniform thickness can be produced.
Titulo: Thickness determination of large-area films of yttria-stabilized zirconia produced by pulsed laser deposition
Thickness determination of large-area films of yttria-stabilized zirconia produced by pulsed laser deposition
